{"blocks":[{"key":"a4cbh","text":"Operate UV sterilization of the laminar flow for 15 minutes. After UV sterilization, you need to ethanol-sterilize the materials that are going into the laminar flow. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4heph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2refg","text":"Light up the alcohol lamp and flame the material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e922p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b88vq","text":"**The materials you need are the same as   , but you only need a scalpel instead of a tweezer and a spreader.**","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":62},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":81,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":84,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":94,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":98,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9veco","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"09358A10E27811EDA13E19E73F1B4F4A","id":0,"step_guid":"9E687DF0D9CB11EDA915BBD02400C055","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bave","text":"Preserve the plates with one water and one glycerol vial for one colony. The rest is for DNA extraction. Make sure you flame-sterilize the scalpel every time before slicing the agar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df27f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9svpo","text":"**The details of culture preservation are not provided here.**","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2atkk","text":"Store the preservation vials in their corresponding freezing box. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebte6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vd9v","text":"For water vials, you can keep them directly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vo8m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc6ha","text":"For glycerol vials, you need to keep them in a freezing container and then freeze them inside a -20C fridge for 1 day before keeping them in the -80C fridge collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l2s1","text":"**The freezing boxes of water vials are kept in the steel cabinet in front of Prof. Huang's office; the freezing boxes of glycerol vials are kept in the -80C fridge outside N927**","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":180}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"807hk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4C7CDB5AE28D11EDAF7C0A58A9FEAC02","height":285.37636363636364,"id":366779,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":87,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"b0pob","text":"The tubes are needed to be kept in the order shown above, but not the other way around.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"PXL_20230411_072345492.MP.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mgf7bxb5f.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mgf5bxb5f.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mgf6bxb5f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mgf4bxb5f.webp","width":253.5654281098546}}}}
